<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Material Component Pouch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=33)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pouch contains material components for those spells that require them. Though the components are used up over time, you can refill spent components during your daily preparations.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Material Component Pouch
